title: Reckless
description: He can run, but he can’t hide A Red Hot Summer story and a stand-alone sequel to Brazen. Sheriff J.T. Summers promised to keep an eye on his best friend’s little sister. What could possibly go wrong? A lot. “Little” Nikki Durant isn’t so little anymore. She’s sex on a stick, and she’s pointed right at him. Nikki has always loved J.T., and she’s through waiting for him to come around. The soaring summer temperature is nothing compared to the heat generated when she sets fire to his senses. With a take-no-prisoners attitude, she’s out to get her man. But no matter how many ways she offers it, J.T.’s not buying. What’s it going to take to get him to realize her love for him isn’t a passing fling? Get herself arrested? Hmm…
author: Maya Banks
